name: Anonymous Leader #3: Little Boney
description: Little Boney once said, "history is a set of lies agreed upon". Bitcoin establishes a decentralized public record of transactions that is immutable, secure, and shared. A single source of truth. A truth machine. Now THAT is something to agree on. Root out the lies and buy bitcoin. The shift is underway... Part 3 of the Anonymous Leader series. 923x1200px GIF, artwork created in adobe illustrator.
collection_description: SuperRare makes it easy to create, sell, and collect rare digital art. SuperRare's smart contract platform allows artists to release limited-edition digital artwork tracked on the blockchain, making the pieces rare, verified, and collectible. Filter the crypto art world's best selling works by artist name, creation type, and year of birth on OpenSea.
